items.title: “Come back on St Leger Day”: Should you buy in September?
items.description: There’s an old adage among investors which goes: “Sell in May and go away, don’t come back until St Leger Day”. Is there any truth to it?

items.title: The common ways you could have invalidated your travel insurance – and how to avoid them
items.description: It can be easy to accidentally breach the terms of your travel insurance. We look at the most common ways this can happen, and how you can avoid them.
